---
title: "Gluteal De-Rotation Provacative Test"
---


- Supine [@aptaCurrentConceptsOrthopaedic2024]
- Passively flex to 90&deg; and end-range ER [@aptaCurrentConceptsOrthopaedic2024]

- Patient actively de-rotates (Returns hip to neutral rotation) [@aptaCurrentConceptsOrthopaedic2024]


Provocation of Lateral Hip pain is a positive test [@aptaCurrentConceptsOrthopaedic2024]


Indicates GTPS due to gluteal tendon dysfunction [@aptaCurrentConceptsOrthopaedic2024]
